neuralj.datasets
Class PatternSet

java.lang.Object
  neuralj.datasets.PatternSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PatternSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents a set of patterns (for example, for a xor patternset, this set would contain all the entries of the xor table)

See Also:
Serialized Form

                                 double validation_percentage,
                                 double test_percentage)
Sets the percentages for splitting the patterns into different sets (must amount to 1)

Parameters:
training_percentage - Percentage for the training set
validation_percentage - Percentage for the validation set
